travels.title: Nicaragua '13
travels.headertext: We visited Nicaragua in April 2012. We spent time in three areas: Granada, Ometepe Island and San Juan del Sur. Those three are the basic 'tourist trail' of Nicaragua, but Nicaragua is undiscovered enough that even the tourist trail isn't all that touristy.

entry.text: We ran across some monkeys on Ometepe
The view from our B & B in San Juan del Sur.
